_COMMENT_: Specifies on which address and port the sync server should listen. Because the Sync client does not allow any changes to the port, you should not mess around with that.
Specifies on which address and port the web server should listen. Feel free to change the settings, and don't forget to take a look at the status page!
Every 10 seconds, BTSync sends a ping to the tracker server. This value specifies after how many seconds without receiving any pings a peer should be considered as dead.
